reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of high quality, soft, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and soft
items.body: Great quality and looks just like the pictures. The color match to the pics is spot on. Comfortable material and I love the slightly oversized fit. The buttons are really nice quality. Nice, thick and warm Read more
items.author: Ryan Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan Sweater
items.body: This cardigan exceeded my expectations in every way. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and comfortable, making it perfect for year-round wear. The fit is true to size and very flattering, with just the right balance of relaxed and polished. It layers beautifully over tees or blouses, and the quality stitching ensures it holds up well after multiple washes. A versatile, timeless piece that can be dressed up for the office or worn casually at home. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Missy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really like it
items.body: Update: I went back and got the cream color as well. I love these. So easy to throw on. This cardigan is very nice. It has a medium thickness, making it perfect to wear over a dress on a spring night or for an office job. It gives off a cozy cottage feel. The buttons are lovely as well, and the fit is true to size. Although the color isn't showing up well in the camera, I purchased the green option, which is exactly what I wanted—a mossy sage color. No smell. Which is amazing. I would rate this cardigan 3.5 stars. I'm not completely in love with it, but I might consider getting the pink one too. Read more
items.author: Amazon Lover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boutique Quality
items.body: Don’t hesitate to buy this sweater. Thick, warm and stylish. I did size down to a small to avoid too much of an oversized look and it’s perfect. The color is as shown and I have not had any problems with misshaping or pilling after washing. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is off, would say to size up...
items.body: The color is exactly like picture. I got an XL. It fits but I wanted it a little bigger to wear a dress shirt under it. It will work but I would've liked to have sized up. I don't think the sizing is accurate. It's a pretty sweater. Just need to be careful it doesn't go in the dryer. Will see if it pills after washing, hopefully not. The buttons are cute and seam quality looks good. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Creases from shipping are bad.
items.body: I had to return these sweaters. They look beautiful in a couple of the reviews I read before buying, but I had no luck getting the creases out of them. I tried every suggestion but nothing worked. They come in tightly vacuum sealed plastic and the creases were severe and could not be removed. The fabric feels synthetic so I didn’t want to put an iron on it. All in all, I wouldn’t recommend. Read more
items.author: Traci M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, Soft, and Not Itchy—Perfect Cardigan!
items.body: Absolutely love this cardigan! The material is thick and high-quality, super soft (not itchy at all), and the shell buttons add the prettiest touch. Feels way more expensive than it is! If you’re thinking about it—just get it! Read more
items.author: Mariah Lanier

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Way, WAYYYY too big for average USA sizing
items.body: I’m a big cardigan person, I tend to get hot wearing layers in cool weather and use them so that I can easily keep comfortable if a room is too warm. So I like cardigans and thought these looked like a good pick. But let me tell ya, I don’t know how they figure their sizing because it is no way accurate when I buy something. I ordered large because I like my sweaters a little loose, but this large was more like XXXL- WAY too large. So back it went for a medium….once again HUGE for a typical medium. It went back too. Overall I like the color and material but I probably won’t reorder a small even though it would probably fit the way I like. Just don’t feel like taking the chance with another order Read more
items.author: d pfeif

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Rust, Blue, Cream, Dustypink, Darkgreen, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow, Mauve, Mustard, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
